courses.customDesc: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B2, B3, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: C3, C4, D1, D3, D4, D5, or F.

C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Any free elective can go here. Review DPR to ensure that the 180 units needed for the degree are met.
